title: Provided however, if podium is proposed it shall not extend beyond 6 m from building line and shall have clear open space of 9 m at ground level OR if the podium is proposed it shall not extend beyond 6m from building line and shall have clear open space of 6 m beyond podium & 9m at ground level with clear height of 4
clause_text: Provided however, if podium is proposed it shall not extend beyond 6 m from building line and shall have clear open space of 9 m at ground level OR if the podium is proposed it shall not extend beyond 6m from building line and shall have clear open space of 6 m beyond podium & 9m at ground level with clear height of 4.5 m from ground to podium (below soffit of the beam) for accessibility of fire appliances No ramps for the podium shall be provided in these side open spaces.
section: Provided, if the building abuts two roads of 9 m or more, then clear open space of 9 m at ground level on one side deemed to be sufficient.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Provided however, if podium is proposed it shall not extend beyond 6 m from building line and shall have clear open space of 9 m at ground level OR if the podium is proposed it shall not extend beyond
